body: Mi think the ending wasn't feel complete. It might be better if he after say he got AIDS, he should telling the girl about her daughter was get killed by that child-whore story. And show that child-whore expression after he telling her deceased daughter story. That's gonna be bang!
Everyone has AIDS! AIDS AIDS AIDS!
bitch never heard about post exposure prophylaxis?

This is it? Seriously? This is a pretty old story, over 10 years I think, and I never expected it to get a translation. I always wondered, what was going on, what did he say to her, why did he try to strangle her. Now that I see the translation, I'm... kinda underwhelmed.
It is the first time that AIDS is mentioned in a hentai. Should not it be something historic?
They were a duo child prostitute that scams money, but shit gone wrong?
So why was her daughter killed?
Oh well, comedy is a Nice change of pace.
The last part lol my stomach hurts lmao
Best nut I have ever had in a while. Nutted while laughing Lmaoo

What are you talking about, this shit is hilarious!
